description.p: Reinschrift combines a native GNOME interface with the simplicity of plain text. Your tasks remain a normal Markdown file – easy to back up, versionable via Git, and editable on any device with your favorite editor.

Whether you share the file via Nextcloud/WebDAV, edit it in the terminal, or run automations over it: the format remains open, portable, and transparent. The app reads changes live, writes directly back, and thus makes classic to-do lists in plain text suitable for everyday use – without proprietary silos.
